citations.narrative:
There is a buildup of dirt and debris on the inside of the automatic waterer in the enclosure housing 30 ewes.
Failure to clean water receptacles on a regular basis can deter the sheep from drinking and introduce disease hazards to
the animals.
All water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary. The licensee must clean the waterer at a frequency that will ensure
potable water is provided to the regulated animals in a sanitary receptacle.
Correct by April 17, 2025 .
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.130 
   
Watering. 
There is a buildup of dirt and debris on the inside of the automatic waterer in the enclosure housing 30 ewes.  
Failure to clean water receptacles on a regular basis can deter the sheep from drinking and introduce disease hazards to 
the animals.  
All water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary. The licensee must clean the waterer at a frequency that will ensure 
potable water is provided to the regulated animals in a sanitary receptacle. 
Correct by April 17, 2025 . 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
